name: Professor Fishur presents Brainoids
description:
Have you ever wondered if you could decode what an AI art generator is thinking?

Instructions are ingame!

* Art generated by Midjourney

* Robots and several other prop models are from Quaternius assets

* Font is Major Mono Display

Who did this?

  • Spacey did [making sure the game idea wasn't too crazy]
  • Josie placed ligths and decorated and maybe some tutorial lines!
  • Landon did programming and audio and leveldesign!

Gameplay Notes:

  • Alt-F4 to exit!
  • There is no indication that AI doesn't like the painting you gave them, sorry!
